regex.name: makelist
regex.listrepeat: <item><title>[COLOR lightgreen][makelist.param1] [/COLOR] [COLOR deepskyblue][makelist.param2] [/COLOR] [COLOR lightslategray][makelist.param3] [/COLOR] [COLOR skyblue][makelist.param4] [/COLOR] + [COLOR lightyellow][makelist.param6] [/COLOR] [COLOR lightyellow][makelist.param8] [/COLOR] [COLOR lightyellow][makelist.param10] [/COLOR] [COLOR lightyellow][makelist.param12] [/COLOR]</title> <link>plugin://program.plexus/?url=[makelist.param5][makelist.param7][makelist.param9][makelist.param11]&mode=1&name=Arenavision</link> </item>
